info.+content: He’s short, weak, and has just transfered to a new school. Kurumatani Sora is the main character in this story who loves basketball. He has been shooting hoops ever since he was little and has been trying to grow tall just like his mother, who “used” to be a basketball player. (from manga)
#3: "Hikari Sasu Hou e" (光射す方へ) by Mamoru Miyano
